snippet: Complete Genomics, a struggling DNA sequencing company in Silicon Valley, has agreed to be acquired for $117.6 million by BGI-Shenzhen, a Chinese company that operates the world's largest sequencing operation.
abstract: Complete Genomics, a struggling DNA sequencing company in Silicon Valley, has agreed to be acquired for $117.6 million by BGI-Shenzhen, a Chinese company that operates the world's largest sequencing operation.

headline.main: Chinese Company to Acquire DNA Sequencing Firm
